project.name: SonarQube
project.description: Open source platform for continuous inspection of code quality

requirePluginVersions.message: Build reproducibility : always define plugin versions

requireReleaseDeps.message: No SNAPSHOT versions allowed for dependencies

requireJavaVersion.message: To build this project JDK ${jdk.min.version} (or upper) is required. Please install it.

requireNoRepositories.message: Definition of new repositories is not allowed in order to deploy to central repository.

requireProperty.message: You must set name of Git repository in your pom
